question: The term “Henderson Brooks report” that was recently making in news, is associated with which of the following?
explanation: The Henderson Brooks report is the report of an analysis (Operations Review) of the Sino-Indian War of 1962. On 17 March 2014, Neville Maxwell, a retired British journalist, posted Volume 1 of the two-volume report on his website. There was a huge demand in India for the report to be made public. The report was written by two officers in the Indian Army: Lieutenant General Henderson Brooks and Brigadier General Premindra Singh Bhagat.
